title: 2-Room Furnished Apartment with City Views & Rooftop Access ‚Äì Prags Boulevard, Amagerbro
description:
This bright, fully furnished 2-room apartment located in Prags Boulevard, the heart of vibrant Amagerbro, will become available for rent starting October 1st. The apartment is available for a rental period of up to two years and is ideal for a tidy, responsible couple or working professionals looking for a well-connected and comfortable home close to both nature and the city.

The apartment is situated on the 4th floor (please note, there is no elevator) of a classic Copenhagen building and offers 63 square meters of well-utilized space. It includes one spacious bedroom with a king-size bed and a large closet, and a bright living room with two comfortable sofas, a dining area with seating for four, a coffee table, and a high-quality Murphy bed that folds down to provide an additional double bed - perfect for visiting guests. Both beds include mattresses, though duvets and pillows are not provided.

The kitchen is equipped with a 4-hob gas stove, oven, washing machine, and a full-size fridge with freezer. Essential kitchenware such as pots, pans, plates, cutlery, and glasses will be included for your use. There is also a built-in recycling and waste sorting system. The bathroom is compact in the traditional Copenhagen style, with a shower, toilet, and sink all in one space, divided by a shower curtain. While small, it is clean and functional.

From the living room, you‚Äôll enjoy a lovely open view of Kl√∏vermarken, offering a green and peaceful backdrop. Despite being in the middle of the city, the apartment is quiet, providing a welcome escape from the hustle and bustle. Yet, you're still only a 9-minute bike ride from Nyhavn and the city center, and just 7 minutes from Amager Strandpark, Copenhagen‚Äôs popular beach area. The Amagerbro Metro station is about 10 minutes away on foot, and the area is well-served by buses.

As a tenant, you'll also have access to several shared amenities in the building, including a large rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the Copenhagen skyline, Amager Strand, and even Sweden on clear days. There is a dedicated drying room for laundry in the attic, a secure basement for bicycle storage, and a pleasant inner courtyard with picnic tables. Additionally, residents can rent a large communal room in the building for gatherings or events.

The apartment will be rented fully furnished with all the essentials in place, but it is not turnkey, meaning personal linens and small household items are not provided. The monthly rent is set at 14,000 DKK, including utilities such as water, electricity, and Wi-Fi. We're asking for a 3-month deposit and three months prepaid (covering the first month‚Äôs rent and prepayment for the final two months), with a two-month notice period for termination.

This home is a great fit for a clean and quiet couple. Smoking and pets are not allowed, and parties are not permitted in order to maintain a respectful environment for all residents in the building.

If you're seeking a beautiful and practical home in one of Copenhagen‚Äôs most exciting neighborhoods, with easy access to both nature and urban life, we would love to hear from you.
address: 18 timer siden, Prags Boulevard, 2300 K√∏benhavn, K√∏benhavn S  - 4. sal

title: Amazing apartment in Sluseholmen
description:
The 3-room apartment is 90 m2. The address is Kenny Drews Vej. The apartment is on the ground floor and therefore has direct access to the water, which you can use all year round. There is no walkway or road surrounding the apartment only water and a courtyard, which make the apartment more private than other ground-floor apartments. 
You can also look forward to wonderful spaciousness thanks to the ceiling height of four meters and two more balconies facing the channel. The fantastic ceiling height of four meters creates a unique atmosphere and feeling within. Especially in the living room, where the many windows both draw in a nice amount of light and gives the opportunity to follow life on the water. A staircase leads up to the spacious kitchen in a stylish design with sand-coloured fronts and space for dining table ect. The top level offers a kitchen, a hallway with laundry facilities and a lovely bathroom that pampers floor heating. The lower-level has living room and bed-room.
The apartment is within walking distance to green spaces on Amager and easy biking distance to Copenhagen center as well as Sydhavn Station. In about a year the new metro live will open with a station about 300 m from the apartment.

description:

Her skaber de store vinduespartier masser af naturligt lys, og den dejlige altan byder p√• gode stunder - perfekt sted til b√•de morgenkaffe og afslapning.

Alrummet giver god plads til b√•de spisebord og sofaarrangement, og et rummeligt v√¶relse bag New Yorker v√¶ggen, giver fin plads til sovev√¶relset . Det store, moderne badev√¶relse er lyst og stilrent med fliser og vaskes√∏jle ‚Äì praktisk og indbydende.

breadcrumb: Hjem > Lejligheder > K√∏benhavn > 2 v√¶relses > Frederiksberg > Hjem > Lejligheder > K√∏benhavn > 2 v√¶relses > Frederiksberg
title: 2-v√¶relses m√∏bleret lejlighed p√• Frederiksberg
description:
English version at the bottom

4 m√•neders leje af fuld m√∏bleret lejlighed  / 4 month rental of fully furnished apartment

Dansk:
Jeg udlejer min 2-v√¶relses lejlighed i 4 m√•neder fra 01/08/2025 til  01/12/2025, grundet at jeg rejser til udlandet. Datoer kan v√¶re lidt fleksibelt. M√•nedlig husleje er 13.000 kr.; prisen er inklusiv WIFI, vand, varme, og el (s√•fremt forbrug er ikke urimeligt). Depositum er 2 m√•neds husleje (26.000 kr.); indflytningspris er derfor 39.000 kr. Husdyr og rygning tillades ikke i lejligheden. 

Lejligheden er 58 m2 (brutto), og lejes ud fuldt m√∏bleret. Der er blandt andet en dobbeltseng (med elevation), sofa, spisebord, stole, og h√¶ves√¶nkeskrivebord. Derudover er der ogs√• en masse k√∏kkenudstyr (tallerkener, bestik, stegepander, gryder, k√∏kkenknive, mm.) og hvidevare, inklusiv opvaskemaskine. 

Stuen er rummeligt med store vinduer, og sovev√¶relset har masser af opbevaringsplads i skabene. K√∏kkenet er fuldt udstyret med god plads, og badev√¶relset har et separat brusebade (s√• man st√•r ikke over h√•ndvasken, ligesom nogle andre lejligheder).


Lokationen er en rolig villavej p√• Frederiksberg, t√¶t p√• Lindevangsparken, og kun 10 minutters gang fra Lindevang metro station, samt 10 minutters gang fra Peter Bangs Vej S-tog station. P√• cykel tager det ca. 20 minutter til indre by. Der findes mange forskellige butikker, supermarkeder og restauranter indenfor g√•afstand, samt mange gr√∏nne omr√•der (s√•som Frederiksberg Have, Solbjerg Parkkirkeg√•rd, Lindevangsparken, og Den Gr√∏nne Sti). 

Der findes f√¶lles vaskerum og t√∏rrerum i bygningen, og en cykelk√¶lder. Lejligheden har ogs√• sin egen vaskemaskine. Der findes en f√¶lles have ude foran som kan bruges af alle beboer, og gr√∏nt udsigt fra stuen. Lejligheden ligger p√• stueetagen, men er h√∏jt nok op og langt nok v√¶k fra gaden, s√• det f√∏les ikke eksponeret. 


Ideelt b√•de for singler eller et par, der leder efter et roligt og centralt sted at bo. 


English:
I am renting out my 2-room apartment for 4 months, from 01/08/2025 until 01/12/2025, as I will be traveling abroad. The dates can be a bit flexible. The monthly rent is 13.000 DKK; the price includes WIFI, water, heating, and electricity (for reasonable levels of consumption). The deposit is 2 months rent (26.000 DKK); the total move-in price is therefore 39.000 DKK. Pets and smoking are not allowed in the apartment. 

The apartment is 58 m2 (total measurement), and is rented out fully furnished. There are, amongst other things: a double bed (with elevation features), a sofa, dining table, chairs, and a raising/lowering desk. In addition there is a lot of kitchen equipment (plates, cutlery, pots and pans, kitchen knives, etc.), along with appliances, including a dishwasher.

The living room is spacious with large windows, and the bedroom has lots of storage space in the cupboards. The kitchen is fully equipped with a good amount of space, and the bathroom has shower is separated from the rest of the bathroom (so you don‚Äôt stand over the sink, like in some apartments). 

The location is a calm residential street in Frederiksberg, close to Lindevang park. It is 10 minutes walk from Lindevang metro station, and also 10 minutes walk away from the Peter Bangs Vej S-train station. Biking to the city center takes about 20 minutes.  There are many different shops, supermarkets and restaurants nearby, as well as many green areas (such as Frederiksberg Have, Solbjerg Parkkirkeg√•rd, Lindevang park, and ‚ÄùThe Green Bike Path‚Äù). 

There is a communal laundry room and rooms to dry laundry, as well as a bicycle storage room. The apartment also has its own washing machine. There is a communal garden along the front of the building, which can be used by all residents, and there is a view of greenery from the living room. The apartment is on the ground floor, but is high enough up and far enough back from the street, so it does not feel exposed. 

An ideal apartment for singles or a couple, who are looking for a calm and central place to live.
address: 3 dage siden, Jyllandsvej, 2000 K√∏benhavn, Frederiksberg  - Stuen

title: Large, bright and spacious apartment for a small family
description:
I am leasing out a nice and ready-to-move-in apartment located in a nice area in N√¶rum (the road is N√¶rum Hovedgade), which is about 4-5 km from DTU. It is close to many supermarkets and transportation. 

It is a cozy apartment of 73 square meters. The apartment is bright and easy to walk to, and it is distributed over an entrance and hallway, a good bedroom, a nice and functional kitchen with dining area, a spacious tiled bathroom with separate shower, underfloor heating and washing machine, as well as a large, west-facing living room (can be used as two rooms) with access to a large balcony.

The apartment has a cozy atmosphere about it, and there is no doubt that the large, west-facing living room is the focal point. There is plenty of space for both a sofa and dining area, and the large windows ensure that daylight is never in short supply ‚Äì there is even direct access to the balcony, which is especially valuable in the warm months.

The balcony extends all the way along the facade of the apartment, and the good size makes it extra usable ‚Äì and yes, it is of course a huge plus that it faces the afternoon and evening sun. There is a right of use to the owners' association's green common areas, and the car owner also gets good parking options.

Close to everything! N√¶rum Hovedgade - the address almost speaks for itself, because here you will live close to everything. This applies to takeaway, shopping opportunities and fitness as well as the rest of the city's opportunities. There are several educational institutions close by, and at the same time the commuter gets extremely easy access to the motorway.

Most of the furniture shown in the pictures can be included. The rent does not include monthly expenses, heating, electricity, internet etc., which will be paid by you directly based on your actual use. The apartment is currently on sale, so we put it at a lower price than that in the market. Please note there may be some showings of the apartment by a professional agent from time to time. You will of course be informed beforehand every time. If you are sure that you want to rent it for a longer time (e.g. 2 years), we can discuss this.

Apartment for Rent ‚Äì Newly Renovated 3-Room Apartment on Quiet Street in Hellerup

Available from: September 1, 2025

Welcome to this newly renovated apartment offering a modern and comfortable home in the heart of Hellerup. This apartment is perfect for a small family or couple looking for a peaceful and functional home close to everything Hellerup has to offer.

The apartment includes:

Kitchen-living area: A bright and open space, renovated in December 2024, featuring a Quooker tap, quiet dishwasher, and stovetop with built-in silent extractor hood. There is access to a south-facing balcony where you can enjoy the sun all day.

Large bedroom: Equipped with a new double bed (180 cm x 200 cm) and ample storage. There is also a workspace in the room (which can be moved to the smaller room if preferred).

Smaller room: Perfect as a child‚Äôs room or office, with a single bed (90 x 200 cm).

Bathroom: Bathroom with washing machine and dryer located under the sink. There is also storage space.

Additional features:

Robot vacuum cleaner

42" TV with Chromecast. Internet is optional and billed separately.

Basement storage room

Fully equipped kitchen: Microwave, large fridge, half freezer, oven, dishwasher, stovetop with built-in extractor hood, as well as dishes and cutlery.

North-facing bedrooms with wardrobes and drawers

The surroundings:

The apartment is located on a quiet street and is very peaceful. There is free parking on surrounding streets (parking permit required via the municipality). Free parking is also available in the courtyard, which is currently under renovation. A license must be obtained through the owner's association.

A new garden and parking area are expected to be ready by late summer.

The area offers many amenities:

Several international schools, parks, and beaches nearby

Multiple nurseries and daycares, including one near Rymarken and a forest kindergarten about 500 meters from the apartment

S-train and railway station about 500 meters away

Contact us for more information. We look forward to hearing from you.

description:

Ejendommen

title: Big apartment ready from August
description:
Seeking expats or foreigners that are here to work x months ahead. 
I, Rasmus, have been renting out to foreigners since 2014.

Big apartment that can be shared by a group of friends or a family.
The apartment is ready from today and up to 2 years ahead. Flexible contract.

One very big bedroom and one smaller.
Very big living room with space for friends.
Good size toilet-room and shower
Dishwasher, washing machine, 2 refrigerators etc.
Free parking
Pets not allowed

There is a cosy shared garden, that nobody ever use even at summertime. Barbecue place as already made.

title: Fully furnished apartment at Amager Strand
description:
ENGLISH BELOW

Velkommen til dit midlertidige hjem i K√∏benhavn
Denne fuldt m√∏blerede lejlighed p√• 60 kvadratmeter ligger p√• anden sal i et roligt og sikkert omr√•de. Lejem√•let er tidsbestemt, grundet at udlejer √∏nsker at selv at bebo ejendommen og oph√∏rer uden yderligere varsel den 31.1.2026. I lejeperioden kan lejem√•let opsiges i henhold til lejelovgivningens regler.

Lejeaftalen er indg√•et som en tidsbegr√¶nset lejeaftale for perioden 1. august 2025 til 31. januar 2026. Lejem√•let oph√∏rer automatisk ved periodens udl√∏b, og hverken lejer eller udlejer beh√∏ver opsige lejem√•let ved udl√∏b. Uanset aftalens tidsbegr√¶nsning, er parterne enige om, at lejem√•let kan opsiges med 1 m√•neds varsel fra begge sider, hvilket er en fravigelse af den almindelige regel for tidsbegr√¶nsede lejem√•l.

Praktisk beliggenhed og livsstil

Daglige forn√∏denheder er lige i n√¶rheden, herunder et supermarked, fitnesscenter, b√∏rnehave og international skole, som alle ligger i g√•afstand. Det n√¶rliggende strandomr√•de, blot 10 minutters gang v√¶k, g√∏r omr√•det endnu mere attraktivt.

Vi byder respektfulde lejere velkommen, hvad enten det er singler, par eller sm√• familier. Lejligheden er r√∏gfri og husdyr er ikke tilladt. Et depositum p√• 13.500 DKK kr√¶ves. Ans√∏gninger behandles efter f√∏rst-til-m√∏lle-princippet, og der afholdes l√∏bende interviews. Hvis du er interesseret i at leje denne dejlige lejlighed, bedes du kontakte os via denne hjemmeside for at arrangere en fremvisning.

ENGLISH:

Welcome to Your Temporary Home in Copenhagen
This fully furnished 60-square-meter apartment is located on the second floor of a quiet and safe neighborhood. It features a bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom, and corridor, as well as a spacious balcony with a sliding glass door. Additional storage is provided in the basement. The apartment is available for 6 months, starting in August 2025, until 31st of Januart 2026. Regardless of the contract duration, the parties can agree on earlier contract termination. In that case, both parties have right to 1 month notice period.

Convenient Location

Situated just 3 minutes from Fem√∏ren Metro Station, this apartment is ideally placed for easy access to Copenhagen. Daily conveniences are right at your doorstep, with a supermarket, gym, kindergarten, and international school within a short walking distance. The nearby beach area, just a 10-minute walk away, adds an extra layer of appeal to this calm and family-friendly location.

Rental with Flexible Terms

We welcome respectful tenants, whether singles, couples, or small families. The apartment is non-smoking and pet-free, and a deposit of 13,500 DKK is required. Applications are reviewed on a first-come, first-served basis, with interviews conducted ongoingly. If you‚Äôre interested in making this lovely apartment your home, please reach out through this website to arrange a viewing.

NOTE: The apartment is furnished or without furniture

Frederiksstaden gives you the best that Copenhagen has to offer. ‚ÄÉ
English:

Bohrs Tower with an impressive unobstructed penthouse view.

Exclusive owner-occupied 163 m2 apartment with an international aspect on the 16th floor of the popular property Bohrs Tower located in the established part of Carlsberg Byen. 

Living in Bohr's Tower is like living permanently in an exclusive hotel. Easy living in high quality. 
Easy access via two elevators directly from the large, attractive hall and from the parking basement.

The apartment is right above Carlsberg Station and gives you easy and quick access to all of Copenhagen and suburbs. 

Shopping, restaurants and takeaways can be found on the ground floor of the property itself. Outside the property is Carlsberg City‚Äôs charming shopping life where one exciting specialty store pops up after another. Everything from grocery stores, gourmet restaurants, rooftop bars, Italian wine bar, ice cream/chocolate shop, coffee shops, museum, art gallery, beauty shop, wellness, pharmacy, city parks, playgrounds, brewery, just to name a few. The pulsating city life can thus be found right outside the door, while feeling the calmness arriving in the elevator on the way to the 16th floor and becoming striking when you enter the apartment where it is completely quiet. A great contrast that works wonderfully.

The heart is the large and very impressive kitchen/family room and living room environment. Large window sections and some with sliding doors create an unrivaled amount of light, and not least, a view out of the ordinary. From here, there is a view over a large stretch of Copenhagen. The living-dining room is particularly spacious and can be divided into sections. In addition to the living room, the apartment offers; 1 master bedroom with built-in wardrobes, 1 walk-in closet/room, 1 bedroom located by the large entrance hall, 1 bathroom with a washing machine/dryer. An extra bedroom can be made if needed ‚Äì see alternative floor plan. A large personal storage room in basement comes with the apartment. Bikes can be safely parked in the locked common room in the basement. 

The apartment appears in particularly well-maintained and exclusive condition. Everything is made of the best quality materials such as Junckers floors, Uno Form kitchen, etc. Everything in the apartment has underfloor heating and a ventilation system. 

The perfect apartment for the family who wants easy living in high quality.

Apartment is rented without furniture ‚Äì pictures with furniture on this ad is for illustrative purposes only.

The rent is for 2 years with the possibility of renewal. Consumption costs are not included.

Not rented out as shared accommodation and pets are not allowed.

description:
Omr√•det:

Velkommen til Helgag√•rd beliggende t√¶t ved Islands Brygge og Indre By!

Ejendommen er en del af Bryggehusene og best√•r af 78 boliger - herunder b√•de lejligheder og byhuse, som stod klar til indflytning i 2019. Arkitekturen i Helgag√•rd er af h√∏j kvalitet og alle boligerne er rummelige og lyse med store vinduespartier og flotte egetr√¶sgulve med gulvvarme. Alle boligerne er udf√∏rt med moderne Svane k√∏kkener med alt i h√•rde hvidevarer og √•ben forbindelse til stuen. Dertil har alle boligerne egen privat altan, terrasse eller tagterrasse.

Ejendommen har f√¶lles g√•rdhave, hvor beboerne kan opholde sig. I gadeplan p√• hj√∏rnet mellem Njalsgade og Amagerf√¶lledvej finder du Rema 1000, hvor du kan handle ind til dagligdagen. Ydereligere er der etv√¶ld af daginstitutioner og skoler i kvarteret. I ejendommens p-k√¶lder erder mulighed for parkering vedoprettelse af etabonnement igennem Q-Park - Bryggens Bastion mod betaling.

Ejendommen har en fantastisk beliggenhed lige midt imellem Islands Brygge og Amagerbrokvarteret - et nyt attraktivt boligkvarter midt mellem storby og natur. Kvarteret er til dig, der √∏nsker en central beliggenhed, arkitektur af h√∏j kvalitet og prioritereret godt n√¶rmilj√∏ med caf√©er og restauranter, gr√∏nne omr√•der og byens liv lige i n√¶rheden.

Der er gode forbindelser til resten af K√∏benhavn med Islands Brygge Metro st., ligesom du hurtigt og nemt kommer rundt p√• cykel. Der er rig mulighed for gode g√•ture ved vandet langs Islands Brygge og Amager F√¶lled lige i n√¶rheden.

title: Gennemf√∏rt 4-v√¶relses lejlighed uden bop√¶lspligt
description:
Smuk 4-v√¶relses lejlighed uden bop√¶lspligt i markant ejendom.

4-v√¶relses lejlighed p√• 146 m2 uden bop√¶lspligt udlejes p√• f√∏rste sal i Salomons Pal√¶ i Klerkegade, K√∏benhavn K. The apartment features three good-sized rooms, a modern kitchen with all necessary appliances, and a stylish bathroom. It is part of a healthy and well-functioning homeowners' association, ensuring well-maintained common areas and a secure daily life.

Vesterbro's Vibrant Life Right at Your Doorstep

With a prime location on Sundevedsgade, you are situated in the middle of one of Copenhagen's most sought-after neighborhoods. From here, you have walking distance to everything your heart desires:

This apartment provides the ideal setting for a couple or a small family dreaming of an exclusive and convenient base in one of Copenhagen's most lively and attractive districts. Experience the best of Vesterbro with this gem of an apartment.

Velkommen til Provianthuset!

Gamle mursten har givet nyt liv i Provianthuset
Provianthusets smukke ydre er skabt med hj√¶lp fra historien. Murstenene stammer oprindeligt fra gamle bygninger p√• Carlsberg, der er blevet revet ned. Herefter er stenene n√¶nsomt renset og fragtet til Nordhavn, hvor de nu udg√∏r murv√¶rket i Provianthuset. Metoden med at genbruge kulbr√¶ndte teglsten giver bygningen et helt s√¶rligt smukt patineret og rustikt udtryk, men genbruget har samtidig ogs√• store milj√∏m√¶ssige fordele. Der spares v√¶sentlige m√¶ngder CO2 ved ikke at bruge ny producerede sten, og selve afrensningen af stenen sker ved mekanisk vibrationsteknologi uden hverken brug af vand eller kemikalier. Stenene b√¶rer historien i sig, sikrer holdbart byggeri og er samtidig garanteret lige s√• st√¶rk og holdbar som nye sten.
I omr√•det ved den gamle Frihavn ligger smukke, gamle havnebygninger, siloer og kajanl√¶g side om side med sp√¶ndende nybyggerier og skaber kontrast, liv og international stemning. Erhverv, boliger og butikker blander sig og g√∏r omr√•det til et trygt sted at v√¶re - hele d√∏gnet. Engang l√• Rhedhavnen her, hvorfra proviant blev sejlet ud til tr√¶skibe fort√∏jet p√• Rheden. Stadig i dag spiller havnen en vigtig rolle i kvarteret og kun f√• skridt fra din hovedd√∏r kan du dyppe t√¶erne i det skvulpende vand, mens du kigger ud mod √òresund og tr√¶kker havluft dybt ned i lungerne.
T√¶t p√• √òsterbro, skoler og indk√∏b. Midt i byen. Lige ved vandet og himlen. Hvor fortid m√∏der fremtiden. Her ligger √Örhusgadekvarteret.
Husdyr er desv√¶rre ikke tilladt.
Lejem√•let kan ikke opsiges de f√∏rste 12 m√•neder. Herefter er der 3 m√•neders opsigelse.

title: Lejlighed midt p√• Christianshavn/Apartment in the heart of Christianshavn
description:
DANSK (English description below): 

Lejligheden og ejendommen
Lejligheden er lys, gennemrenoveret, har slebne plankegulve og ligger p√• 4. sal. Der er √•bent stue-/k√∏kken-alrum med stor bordplade, ovn, gaskomfur, opvaskemaskine og vaskemaskine. Fra den hyggelige altan har man udsigt over g√•rden. Sovev√¶relset byder p√• et stort, indbygget skab og v√¶gh√¶ngte sengeborde. Fra entreen er der adgang til det lille men moderne badev√¶relse. Ejendommen er meget velholdt og popul√¶r. Der er masser af siddemuligheder, grill og gr√∏nne arealer i g√•rden samt afl√•st cykelk√¶lder. Burmeistersgade har for nylig gennemg√•et en st√∏rre renovering og der er b√•de et pizzeria, et supermarked og en kiosk, hvor man kan hente post/pakker lige om hj√∏rnet.
 
Omgivelserne
Lejligheden ligger 2 minutters gang fra Christianshavns kanal. Man skal kun krydse en enkelt bro for at komme til Broens Gadek√∏kken, der har streetfood om sommeren og sk√∏jtebane om vinteren. Lige over for ligger Papir√∏en, hvor man kan nyde solen fra det nye tr√¶d√¶k og hvor et 5.000 m2 wellness- og spabad forventes at √•bne i 2026. Der er kun en kort g√•tur til operaen, den nyanlagte Operapark og Christianias smukke naturarealer midt i byen. Reffen kan hurtigt n√•s p√• cykel. Der er om sommeren masser af bademuligheder p√• og omkring Christianshavn. 
 
Transport
Buslinje 2A g√•r fra nabovejen og Christianshavn metrostation kan n√•s p√• 5-10 minutter til fods. Nyhavn og Indre By kan n√•s p√• 10-15 minutter via Inderhavnsbroen.

Praktisk
Overtagelse 1/7 eller efter aftale. Lejeperioden er √©t √•r. Lejligheden udlejes uden de flytbare m√∏bler og pendellamper, der ses p√• billederne. Der er adgang til et k√¶lderrum.

ENGLISH:
 
About the apartment and building
The apartment is bright, fully renovated, features sanded wooden floorboards, and is located on the 4th floor. It has an open-plan living room and kitchen with a large countertop, oven, gas stove, dishwasher, and washing machine. From the cozy balcony, you have a view of the courtyard. The bedroom includes a large built-in wardrobe and wall-mounted bedside tables. The apartment has a small but modern bathroom. The building is well-maintained and the courtyard offers plenty of seating opportunities, green spaces, can be used for barbecue, and gives access to a locked bicycle storage room. Burmeistersgade has recently undergone major renovations, and there is a pizzeria, a supermarket, and a kiosk for parcel pick-up right around the corner.
 
The surroundings
The apartment is just a 2-minute walk from the Christianshavn Canal. You only need to cross one small bridge to reach Broens Gadek√∏kken, which offers street food in the summer and an ice skating rink in the winter or Papir√∏en, where you can enjoy the sun on the new wooden deck, and where a 5,000 m¬≤ wellness and spa facility is expected to open in 2026. The Opera House and Opera Park, as well as the beautiful green spaces of Christiania are all within walking distance. Reffen which offers more street food and lots of activities is just a short bike ride away. During the summer, there are plenty of swimming spots in and around Christianshavn.
 
Transport
Bus line 2A runs from the next street, and Christianshavn Metro Station can be reached on foot in 5‚Äì10 minutes. Nyhavn and the city centre are just a 10‚Äì15 minute walk across Inderhavnsbroen (bridge across the harbour) .
 
Practical Information
Available from July 1st. The rental period is one year. The apartment is rented out without the movable furniture and pendant lamps seen in the photos. A basement storage room is available.

title: Lyse lejligheder p√• en rigtig dejlig adresse i Glostrup
description:
Hvis du dr√∏mmer om at bo p√• en sk√∏n, central adresse, der stadig ikke er langt fra naturomr√•der, s√• er det her, du skal l√¶se med. Disse tiltalende lejligheder ligger nemlig i en gulstensbygning i Glostrup. 

N√•r du bos√¶tter dig her, kan du g√• eller cykle til mere eller mindre alt, du skal bruge. P√• ganske f√• minutter n√•r du n√¶rmeste supermarked, og du skal ikke meget l√¶ngere for at finde flere andre. Du har rige muligheder for at dyrke en aktiv fritid i Glostrup Hallen og sv√∏mmehallen, eller du kan cykle en tur ud under tr√¶kronerne i Vestskoven. Ydermere finder du Glostrup Shoppingcenter t√¶t p√•, ligesom byen i det hele taget har flere specialbutikker og spisesteder. Endelig er det let at pendle fra adressen - bussen stopper lige overfor boligkomplekset, og der er under halvanden kilometer til S-togsstationen med mange afgange til K√∏benhavn H. Desuden n√•r bilen motorvejen p√• fem minutter. 

Tilbage p√• adressen m√∏der du det klassiske bygningsv√¶rk, som er opf√∏rt i 1961 og har de arkitektoniske linjer, der matcher tiden. Langs boligkomplekset l√∏ber et f√¶llesarealet med masser af pl√¶ne, s√• her er rig mulighed for at s√¶tte sig ud og nyde en solstr√•le. Der er tilmed en legeplads med sandkasse, gynger og legehus. 

Lejlighederne kendetegnes ved fine, stilrene rammer, hvor eksempelvis det p√¶ne gulv fremh√¶ves nydeligt at lysindfaldet via de store vinduespartier. Der hersker en luftig og behagelig atmosf√¶re, som du hurtigt vil f√∏le dig hjemme i.

OBS! Billeder, plantegning og tekst er vejledende og kan afvige fra boligens faktiske forhold.

ENGELSK:

Are you dreaming of living in a brand new, modern, and spacious corner apartment with fantastic natural light and an unobstructed view of the beautiful Carl's Garden? Now you have the chance to rent this unique 6-room, 125 m¬≤ apartment, located in the renowned Nebelong Hus in the heart of Copenhagen's most exciting new district, Carlsberg Byen. This rental is open to private individuals, and expatriate employees (expats).

The apartment will be handed over as a new construction in June 2025 and is available for rent from July 1st, 2025, to approximately May 2026 (approx. 11 months), with the possibility of extension by agreement.

About the Apartment:

Type: Bright and attractive corner apartment with optimal natural light and views.
Area: 125 m¬≤ of living space.
Rooms: 6 rooms, including a large, bright living room openly connected to a open kitchen, a master bedroom, and three additional well-sized rooms perfect as bedrooms, children's rooms, or a home office.
View: Enjoy the open view, with a look towards green areas and Carl's Garden.
Bathrooms: The apartment offers two separate, modern, and well-appointed bathrooms.
Kitchen & Appliances: New, stylish kitchen with quality appliances, including a dishwasher, large fridge/freezer, built-in oven, and induction hob. Furthermore, a washing machine and tumble dryer are included in the apartment.
Balcony: Lovely 5 m¬≤ balcony, where the view and sun can be enjoyed.
Condition: Brand new (completed June 2025).
Facilities: Elevator in the building and bicycle storage associated with the apartment.
About Nebelong Hus & Carlsberg Byen:

Nebelong Hus, designed by Vilhelm Lauritzen Architects, is an elegant 5-story residential building that beautifully reflects its historic surroundings at Malttorvet. The property features a lovely green courtyard garden reserved for residents.

The location is in the quiet southwestern corner of Carlsberg Byen, with direct access to the district's large, beautiful parks such as Carl Jacobsens Have and J.C. Jacobsens Have. At the same time, you are just a few steps from the vibrant life of the district at Bryggernes Plads and Ottilia Jacobsens Plads, with caf√©s, shops, cultural attractions, and excellent infrastructure.

Practical Information:

Furnishing: The apartment is rented unfurnished.
Insurance: It is a requirement that the tenant takes out and maintains a personal liability insurance for the entire rental period.
Smoking: Smoking is strictly prohibited in the apartment and on the balcony.
Short-Term Letting: Subletting via Airbnb or similar short-term rental platforms is strictly prohibited.
Viewings: By appointment

Open house Thursday, May 29th at 9:00 AM.

Bright and Cozy Apartment in Valby with Access to Shared Rooftop Terrace and Common Lounge

This charming 1-room apartment of 32 square meters is nicely laid out and benefits from great natural light through its large window.

It is possible to purchase a monthly parking permit for the parking garage located behind the building.

The apartment is rented out unfurnished.

description:

Her er h√∏jt til loftet ‚Äì de l√¶kreste brede Dinesen gulve og lejligheden er m√∏blerede med et mix af dansk og internationalt design. Lejligheden er til leje fra 1/6-25 i 1 √•r.
Lejligheden indeholder: God fordelings entr√© med plads til overt√∏j, rummeligt badev√¶relse med brus og vaskefaciliteter. Depotrum med god plads til opbevaring. Sovev√¶relse med skabsv√¶g samt et kontor. Fra entr√©en g√•r man ned til det store k√∏kken-alrum og stue ud i et med et l√¶kkert nyere k√∏kken. Nimbusparken er nu forvandlet til et popul√¶rt boligomr√•de, hvor det r√• look er kombineret med gr√∏nne og idylliske haverum. I Nimbusparken bor man trygt og stille uden gennemg√•ende trafik. New York meets elegant Frederiksberg in this tastefully FURNISHED apartment. The building is the former Nimbus motorbike factory, which today has been converted into 28 beautiful loft apartments. There are high ceilings - the most beautiful wide Dinesen floors and the apartment is furnished with a mix of Danish and international design. The apartment is for rent from 1/6-25 for 1 year.
The apartment contains: Good entrance hall with space for outerwear, spacious bathroom with shower and washing facilities. Storage room with plenty of space for storage. Bedroom with a closet wall and an office. From the entrance hall you go down to the large kitchen-dining room and living room all in one with a newer kitchen. Here you have direct access to a large west-facing terrace with afternoon/evening sun - perfect for enjoying a nice glass of ros√©.
Nimbusparken has now been transformed into a popular residential area where the raw look is combined with green and idyllic garden spaces. Etape 5: Boligerne bliver f√¶rdige i 6 etaper og denne bolig ligger i ejendommens femte etape med indflytning 1. juni 2025.
G√•rdrum og f√¶llesskab:

Forestil dig at bo et sted, hvor du kan have naturen og alt hvad du skal bruge i hverdagslivet t√¶t p√• ‚Äì og samtidig have K√∏benhavn inden for r√¶kkevidde. Praktisk:

English: 
Planning an extended stay in Copenhagen and looking for a furnished apartment?
Then this 119 sqm, 4-room apartment might be just what you‚Äôre looking for. Located in a quiet yet central neighborhood, just a short walk from Tivoli Gardens, the Glyptotek Museum, Kalvebod Brygge, Copenhagen Central Station, and the metro.

Move-in date: 1 August 2025. 

The apartment is fully furnished and available for a 12-month rental with the possibility of extension.

The apartment offers:
- A bright and welcoming living room with stucco ceilings, high panels, and ceilings over 3 meters
- Dining room in open connection with the living area
- Kitchen equipped with all essential appliances
- Bedroom facing a quiet courtyard
- Walk-in closet (which can also be converted into a child‚Äôs room)
- Southeast-facing balcony
- Plenty of on-street parking nearby (residential parking permit available at a low cost)
- Small pets are allowed
- EV charging stations available on the street

The apartment is ideal for a couple or a small family looking to live centrally in Copenhagen without compromising on comfort, charm, or peace and quiet.

title: Spacious, furnished apartment with lots of sunlight and park-view, south-facing balcony
description:
We will be spending some time abroad and are therefore renting out our beloved home. The apartment is a spacious 94 square meters, boasting two cozy bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, a proper bathroom and a huge open living space with a south-facing balcony. As there is a park right outside the window, it feels very close to nature while still being central. The modern apartment complex also comes with a shared garden complete with new playground, a BBQ area, boules, and more. An elevator enables easy access whenever needed. This rental is perfect for two adults or a couple or a small family with one child. It is fully furnished incl. all key electrical appliances, fully equipped kitchen etc.

It is located just a short walk away from Frederiksberg Center and Valby. You'll have easy access to supermarkets and take-away options, making your daily life a breeze. It is also just a 15min bus or bike ride to the city center with an "A bus" just outside the door and only a few minutes walking distance from the closest S-train station.
  
We are looking for tenants for June and July this year, exact timing can be discussed

title: POSTBYEN, LEJEBOLIGER
description:
Nu kan du flytte ind i Postbyens t√•rne, og se K√∏benhavn fra oven.

Postbyens markante silhuet med sine fire runde t√•rne er allerede blevet et nyt vartegn for den centrale del af K√∏benhavn. I to af t√•rnene indrettes der 160 moderne lejeboliger, som nu udbydes til udlejning med indflytning i februar 2026. Lejlighederne varierer i st√∏rrelse fra to til syv v√¶relser og er alle udstyret med altan med udsigt til byens liv og Postbyens gr√∏nne oaser.

I Postbyen bor du i et helt nyt levende bykvarter med hoteller, butikker, restauranter, caf√©er, og meget mere. Dit nye hjem ligger omgivet af smuk arkitektur, og nedenfor din hovedd√∏r ligger byparken, der gr√∏nt og frodigt snor sig gennem Postbyen. Fri for biler og med plads til mennesker.

Boligerne og deres arkitektoniske fremtoning

Uanset om du lejer en 2-v√¶relses eller en 7-v√¶relses bolig i Postbyen, kommer du til at leve i et unikt og utraditionelt hjem, der byder p√• alt andet end kvadratiske rum. De cirkelrunde boligt√•rne skaber nemlig vinkler, snit og hj√∏rner, hvor man hver dag kan gl√¶des over at bo i et hjem, hvor v√¶gge, gulve og lofter ikke f√∏lger den traditionelle vinkeltrekant.
Boligt√•rnenes karakteristiske takkede facadeprofiler skaber nogle sp√¶ndende indvendige vinduesl√∏sninger med dybe nicher. Det giver en r√¶kke hyggelige kroge, hvor udsigten kan nydes med en pude i ryggen og byen for f√∏dderne.
Alle boliger er fork√¶let med muligheden for at sidde udenfor p√• sin egen, private altan, hvor udsigten tager vejret fra dig, jo h√∏jere du bor. En oplevelse, der f√∏rst slutter, n√•r elevatoren standser ved 28. etage i det h√∏jeste boligt√•rn.

Nordiske materialer og r√• kontraster
Tr√¶d ind i et hjem, hvor √¶stetik og funktionalitet g√•r h√•nd i h√•nd. Alle lejligheder i Postbyen er gennemt√¶nkt ned til mindste detalje med materialer, der emmer af varme og elegance. De lyse lamelplankegulve i natureg med gulvvarme l√∏ber i et ubrudt flow gennem rummene og binder boligen harmonisk sammen.
Med lofter og s√∏jler i beton opst√•r der en sp√¶ndende og r√• kontrast mellem det varme tr√¶ og den karakteristiske betonstruktur og tilf√∏rer boligen kant og karakter.

K√∏kkenalrummet har direkte adgang til altanen, hvor dagslyset str√∏mmer ind. Her m√∏der str√∏mlinet design fra Invita og corianbordplader de nyeste h√•rde hvidevarer i h√∏j kvalitet. Det enkle design skaber en rolig og stilfuld ramme, hvor udsigten f√•r lov at stj√¶le opm√¶rksomheden.

Badev√¶relserne videref√∏rer den enkle og eksklusive stil med smukke gr√• fliser, v√¶gh√¶ngte toiletter og en atmosf√¶re af diskret luksus.
Som en gennemt√¶nkt detalje er alle indvendige d√∏re udf√∏rt som indbyggede skyded√∏re, der b√•de er pladsbesparende og giver et enkelt udtryk mellem rummenes indbyrdes forhold.

F√¶lles¬≠faciliteter -
med himlen som n√¶rmeste nabo
√òverst oppe i begge boligt√•rne er der skabt rum for to imponerende f√¶llesrum, hvor du som lejer kan booke dig ind til at afholde arrangementer, f√∏dselsdage eller barned√•ben. M√•ske er i en r√¶kke naboer, der g√•r sammen om at booke en foredragsholder eller en yogainstrukt√∏r ‚Äì der kan v√¶re noget ret magisk over at lave en solhilsen med udsigt over byen, √òresund og hele vejen til Sverige.

 * Det er ikke tilladt at st√• i RKI el.lign.

title: Townhouse lejlighed i 2-plan med stor privat tagterrasse
description:
Sk√∏n lejlighed p√• 166 kvm med v√¶relser i stueplan og f√¶lles opholdsrum p√• 1 salen + 43 kvm tagterrasse, hvor  i kan nyde solen i fred og ro. I befinder jer p√• K√∏benhavns attraktive havnefront - Sluseholmen. Omr√•det har ideel placering, om du arbejder i eller udenfor byen. 

Lejligheden indeholder: Rummelig entr√© med trappe til 1 salen, 3 gode v√¶relser samt badev√¶relse med brus og vaskefaciliteter. 1 salen byder g√¶stetoilet, kontor afdeling samt p√• et  stort k√∏kken-alrum ifm. med stuen, Her er en ekstra loftsh√∏jde (ca. 5 m) og vinduer fra gulv til loft, der giver et fantastisk lysindfald samt en god udsigt over kanalerne og havneindl√∏bet.
P-plads med mulighed for Clever ellader i k√¶lderen samt b√•dplads kan tillejes.
Tilleje i 3-4 √•r

Her er kort afstand til motorvej & lufthavn, f√• minutter til S-tog og indre City er blot et lille kvarter v√¶k. Omr√•det er kendetegnet ved de mange kanaler, slusen og havnel√∏bet der sammen med de mange sm√• b√•dklubber samt havnebadet giver en sk√∏n maritim stemning. INFO : I 2024 kommet den nye metro M4, som k√∏rer direkte til Orientkat i Nordhavn (CIS), hvor det n√¶rmeste stop er blot 5 min. p√• g√•ben fra lejligheden, som g√∏r det endnu lettere at komme ind til centrum.

2-storey townhouse apartment with large private roof terrace for rent for 3-4 years.
This apartment offers 166 sqm with rooms on the ground floor and living space on the first floor + 43 sqm roof terrace where you can enjoy the sun in peace and quiet. You are located on Copenhagen's attractive harbour front - Sluseholmen. The area is ideally located whether you work in or outside the city. 
The apartment contains: Spacious entrance hall with stairs to the first floor, 3 good bedrooms and a bathroom with shower and laundry facilities. The 1st floor offers a guest toilet, office area and a large kitchen-dining room in connection with the living room. Here there is an extra ceiling height (approx. 5 m) and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide fantastic light and a good view of the canals and the harbour.
Parking space with the possibility of Clever electric charger in the basement and a boat mooring can be rented.
There is a short distance to the motorway & airport, a few minutes to the S-train and the inner city is just a short block away. The area is characterised by the many canals, the lock and the harbour circuit, which together with the many small boat clubs and the harbour baths create a wonderful maritime atmosphere. INFO : In 2024, the new metro M4 had arrived, running directly to Orientkat in Nordhavn (CIS), with the nearest stop just a 5-minute walk from the apartment. on foot from the apartment, making it even easier to get into the city centre.

title: Charmerende vilalejlighed med egen have og br√¶ndeovn, 200m fra Husum station
description:
üî∂ 3 v√¶relser - 95 m¬≤ - Br√∏nsh√∏j üî∂ Hyggelig stor lejlighed med tre v√¶relser, k√∏kken, badev√¶relse, br√¶ndeovn og egen have.

----- ENGLISH BELOW -----

Lejligheden har en unik beliggenhed t√¶t p√• de virkelig flotte gr√∏nne omr√•der Utterslev Mose og Kagsmose. Den ligger t√¶t p√• indk√∏bssteder p√• Frederikssundsvej og hyggelige caf√©er og spisesteder omkring Husum. 
Den ligger ogs√• kun 4 min v√¶k fra Husum station, hvor man med S-tog kan tage til central K√∏benhavn i kun 23 minutter. Toget k√∏rer hver 10 minutter p√• hverdage. 

Lejligheden er p√• 95 kvm. og er utrolig godt indrettet. 
Der er bryggers ved indgangen med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumber, der kan benyttes i lejeperioden uden mereomkstninger. 
P√• f√∏rste sal er der k√∏kken med udstyr og direkte adgang til en stor stue med br√¶ndeovn, der g√∏r stedet meget hyggelig. Der er ogs√• en stor og flot balkon, mens der kommer meget dagslys til stuen fra de to store altand√∏re.  
P√• den anden side er der to fine sovev√¶relser samt flot toilet med brusekabine og h√•ndvask.

Til sidst tilh√∏rer en virkelig flot have lejligheden, hvor man kan nyde det gode vejr og kreative aktiviteter som havepasning. Der er ogs√• et stort opbevaringsrum. 

Aconto bel√∏b d√¶kker over vand. Elforbrug afregnes s√¶rkilt. Der kr√¶ves 3 m√•neds depositum og 3 m√•neds forudbetalt husleje.

----- ENGLISH -----

The apartment has a unique location, 200 meters from Husum Station, and also walking distance to two of the best parks in Copenhagen area, Utterslev Mose and Kagsmose.

In the area you can find several restaurants and caf√©s. The center of the city is 23 minutes away by S-train, which runs every 10 minutes during weekdays.

The apartment is 95 sqm. and ideally distributed. It has its own entrance, where you will find the laundry room, exclusive to the apartment. Up the stairs, one arrives at fully equiped kitchen.
Next to it, there is a spacious living room with a fireplace, and a large covered balcony with sliding doors that illuminate the entire room.
On the other side there is a roomy bathroom, with vanity and shower. Finally, there are two spacious carpeted bedrooms overlooking the side and front yards.
Outside in the garden, one can enjoy the outdoors and practice some gardening. There is also a generous storage room.

The utilities payment is for water. Electricity is billed directly by the provider. A deposit of 3 months and 3 months prepaid rent is required.

Gamle mursten har givet nyt liv i Provianthuset.
Provianthusets smukke ydre er skabt med hj√¶lp fra murstenene der oprindeligt stammer fra gamle bygninger p√• Carlsberg, der er blevet revet ned.
Herefter er stenene n√¶nsomt renset og fragtet til Nordhavn, hvor de nu udg√∏r murv√¶rket i Provianthuset. Metoden med at genbruge kulbr√¶ndte teglsten giver bygningen et helt s√¶rligt smukt patineret og rustikt udtryk, men genbruget har samtidig ogs√• store milj√∏m√¶ssige fordele. Stenene b√¶rer historien i sig, sikrer vision√¶rt byggeri og er samtidig garanteret lige s√• st√¶rk og holdbar som nye sten.
I omr√•det ved den gamle Frihavn ligger smukke, gamle havnebygninger, siloer og kajanl√¶g side om side med sp√¶ndende nybyggerier og skaber kontrast, liv og international stemning. Erhverv, boliger og butikker blander sig og g√∏r omr√•det til et trygt sted at v√¶re - hele d√∏gnet.
Engang l√• Rhedhavnen her, hvorfra proviant blev sejlet ud til tr√¶skibe fort√∏jet p√• Rheden. breadcrumb: Hjem > Lejligheder > K√∏benhavn > 3 v√¶relses > K√∏benhavn K > Hjem > Lejligheder > K√∏benhavn > 3 v√¶relses > K√∏benhavn K
title: Unique furnished apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
The apartment is available from July 14 for a one-year lease, with possibility of extension.

We are looking for a single person or a couple. It is not suitable for families or sharing, and pets are not allowed.

This three-room corner apartment is located in a rare building in old town Copenhagen with a spectacular view of the historical Nikolaj Church. The apartment has the full corner of the building and is situated on the 3rd floor allowing plenty of light from six windows facing the street and two windows facing the rooftops and Parliament building. The fully equipped kitchen and bathroom are newly renovated. The large and bright living room features an old fireplace, inbuilt shelves, a desk, a solid oak wood table with space for six people, a two-seater sofa, and chairs from &tradition. All furniture and lighting are high-quality contemporary design. The kitchen is equipped with a Dishwasher, oven, washing machine, microwave oven, and the apartment has a lot of inbuilt storage space. The bedroom has a tall double bed and a closet fitting-room style. The middle room is an 18th-century service hall remade as a guest room with a daybed. 

We are a Swedish/Danish couple renting out the Apartment on a long term basis because we are living in New York. You can visit the apartment by contacting us here.

title: 118 kvm, Prime location, UDEN bop√¶lspligt p√• Store Strandstr√¶de
description:
Exclusive and well placed apartment the heart of Copenhagen just a short step from Nyhavn.
Renovated and in very good condition, big windows and a lot of light passing in to the apartment.

The appartment is in very good condition
The apartment is uden bop√¶lspligt and is only rented to expats or companies.
Can also be used for company office

title: H√∏j kvalitets lejlighed med stor altan og fantastisk udsigt
description: Beliggende p√• 3. sal i 'Gemini-Residence' er denne pragtfulde udsigtslejlighed nu til leje. Lejligheden er sydvendt og har flere udgange til en stor overd√¶kket altan p√• ca. 45 m2 med en fantastisk udsigt over Amager F√¶lled, Islands Brygge og havneforl√∏bet og vandet i K√∏benhavns Havn. En absolut s√¶rlig lejlighed.Man ankommer med elevator til 3. sal. Her er videre gang til lejlighedens entre. N√•r man tr√¶der ind i lejligheden, ankommer man i stort stuerum. Her rammes man med det samme af det imponerende naturlige lysindfald og drages af den fremragende udsigt af gulv til loft-vinduespartierne. Entr√©en g√•r direkte ud til det √•bne stuerum, hvor der er god plads til at indrette b√•de spise- og opholdsstue. K√∏kkenet er ligeledes i √•ben forbindelse og er udstyret med en flytbar k√∏kken√∏ og alle n√∏dvendige h√•rde hvidevarer.Fra stuerummet er udgang til den store, aflange altan. Her er god mulighed for at indrette flere afdelinger og sektioner - og udnytte lyset i l√∏bet af hele dagen. Her er en fremragende udsigt til b√•de vand, land og by - og et evigt levende bybillede at f√∏lge med i. Yderligere er her meget privat, da man er h√¶vet over alle √∏vrige bebyggelser i n√¶romr√•det.Der forefindes to gode sovev√¶relser i hver sin ende af lejligheden. De er begge udf√∏rt med indbyggede skabe og har begge udgang til den store altan. Det ene sovev√¶relse har direkte adgang til det prim√¶re badev√¶relse, der er udstyret med separat bruseniche og vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. Yderligere forefindes et g√¶stebadev√¶relse med separat bruseniche.Til lejlighed medf√∏lger privat p-plads i p-k√¶lderen samt privat k√¶lderrum.Udlejes ikke som delebolig.Forbrugsudgifter er ikke inkluderet i huslejen.

I hjertet af g√•rdhaven, mellem de to bebyggelser, finder du et idyllisk orangeri ‚Äì et sk√∏nt samlingspunkt, der er skabt med henblik p√• at fremme f√¶llesskab, trivsel og gode stunder blandt beboerne. Her er plads til b√•de afslapning og sociale oplevelser.

Almost with your feet in the √òresund, this large, beautiful villa apartment is located just behind the cosy Hellerup Harbour and Hellerup Tennis Club. English:
Large, lovely 3-room residence with 2 spacious rooms, a living room connected to an open kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, and a large, south-facing balcony with a fantastic view.

The apartment is located on the 3rd floor at the corner/gable of a modern property centrally on Islands Brygge. It is well distanced from all neighbors and has a lovely view of a green wedge, plenty of sky, and the water of Copenhagen's canals while being set back enough that the lively atmosphere of Brygge does not disturb.

Upon entering the apartment, you step into a spacious hallway with room for outerwear. From there, you have access to a large living area that serves as both a dining and living room. The kitchen is in open connection with the living area and is equipped with a large kitchen island and all necessary appliances. From the living area, there is direct access to a large, covered balcony with furniture and a view of a green area and water. The apartment has two bedrooms; one with built-in closets and both furnished with a bed or sofa bed. The bathroom is large and spacious, tiled with two separate sinks, cabinet space, and a separate shower niche and washing facilities.

The apartment is located minutes from Islands Brygge Metro Station, Dybbelsbro S-train Station, Fisketorvet Shopping Center, and Copenhagen Central Station. There is also easy access to Islands Brygge harbor and swimming area, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, gyms, and fitness centers all within walking distance, and easy access to the historical Christianshavn and the inner city via Copenhagen's bicycle bridges. A very short distance away lies Amager F√¶lled, which offers beautiful nature and rich wildlife, ideal for picnics, walks, and runs away from the noise and bustle of city life. With Amager F√¶lled's extensive trail system, there is a short distance to, among other places, DR-Byen and the University of Copenhagen.

The property features an open green courtyard with a playground. There is an elevator in the building. The area around the apartment has ample parking opportunities. The apartment is rented out furnished with various kitchen utensils, tableware, etc., and is ready to move into. Internet is included in the rent, while water and heating are paid on account. Other utility expenses such as electricity are not included in the rent. Contact for a viewing today.

description:
MOVE IN DATE, ASAP IN JUNE 2025.

Looking for a home in the inner city - then look no further!

The apartment is close to Town Hall Square, Str√∏get, which means that all necessities are within walking distance.

The apartment itself is located on Vestergade on the 2nd floor. Vestergade is known as one of Copenhagen's liveliest streets.

The apartment consists of two rooms of 21 sqm, a smaller room 15 sqm, a kitchen of about 8 sqm and a bathroom 5 sqm, which totals to 64 sqm. The kitchen is equipped with the necessary utensils that a modern kitchen contains. The bathroom is a small classical Copenhagen bathroom, fitted with a shower and a wall-mounted toilet.

As can be seen in the pictures, the apartment is partially furnished. The apartment will include furniture such as: bed, bedside table, dining table & folding chairs, sofa, TV table, clothes rack, ceiling lamps, curtains, fridge, oven and hob. 

Prices are as follows: Entire apartment of 64 sqm: DKK 14,500 + DKK 700. The price of water has been determined to DKK 700, however, in case of overuse extra charges could occur. Electricity is based on your monthly usage. Wifi is available at extra charge.

Note: It should be pointed out that the apartment does not include all objects which can be seen in the pictures.

When contacting, please inform us with the following text: 

Name of tenants, age, expected move-in and move-out date. Also write a little about yourself and what you do on a daily basis.

Dine h√•rde hvidevarer er af m√¶rket Vestfrost, som leverer k√∏le-/fryseskab, opvaskemaskine, ovn og induktionskogeplade med 4 sektioner.

title: Stor og moderne 4-v√¶relses lejlighed med altan i Tingbjerg
description:
Om boligen: 

 

 Denne rummelige 4-v√¶relses lejlighed i Tingbjerg er perfekt til dig, der √∏nsker god plads og en funktionel planl√∏sning. Lejligheden har tre store sovev√¶relser, hvor der er rigeligt med plads til b√•de opbevaring og privatliv. 

 

Det √•bne k√∏kken med k√∏kken-√∏ giver b√•de plads og mulighed for at tilberede mad, samtidig med at det er i direkte forbindelse med alrummet, hvor der er god plads til et stort sofaarrangement ‚Äì perfekt til b√•de afslapning og underholdning. 

 

Fra sovev√¶relset er der direkte adgang til en altan, hvor du kan nyde morgenkaffen eller solen. 

 

Lejligheden har et moderne badev√¶relse og gulvvarme i alle rum, der skaber en behagelig temperatur √•ret rundt. Med en ideel beliggenhed t√¶t p√• offentlig transport, indk√∏b og gr√∏nne omr√•der, f√•r du b√•de komfort og bekvemmelighed i hverdagen. 

Bem√¶rk venligst, at billederne kan v√¶re fra en anden bolig, hvorfor indretning, beliggenhed og udsigt kan variere. Materialevalg og kvalitet er den samme for alle boliger i ejendommen. Se plantegningen for indretningen af denne bolig. 

 

 

Ejendommen:

title: Super nice 2-room apartment in Frederiksberg C -Expats only
description:
The apartment is located at a highly sought after address in Frederiksberg. The apartment can be rented for 1-2 years. No Pets!
The apartment is on the 4th floor. There is access to the apartment via a closed gate and the beautiful courtyard environment. There is an elevator!
The apartment is a large 2 bedroom apartment of 86 m2 and offers a distribution entrance with built-in closets and space for outerwear. From the hallway there is a newer, nice bathroom. The bathroom is in a good size with underfloor heating, shower, built-in IF√ñ hanging toilet and with washer and dryer.
The apartment has a state-of-the-art kitchen living room with the most delicious appliances as well as Quooker Fusion and wine refrigerator.
The apartment has a nice large living room, where there is plenty of space for both dining area and sofa area. From the living room there is access to the balcony with plenty of space to sit and enjoy the afternoon and evening sun.
Furthermore, there is a large bedroom with fitted wardrobes.
There are two balconies ‚Äì one to the northeast at the entrance to the apartment and one to the southwest.
Aconto consumption:
Heating: 560 DKK pr. month
Water: 260 DKK per. month
Internet: 250 DKK pr. month
Broadband is installed via wireless modem from Yousee. The subscription can be taken over.
The apartment is NOT for sharing!! When contacting, please note your phone number !!

The area: Holger Danskes Vej is located centrally in Frederiksberg, close to all the good shopping opportunities, the atmospheric cafe life and the many coffee bars on Falkoner Alle and Godth√•bsvej as well as walking distance to means of transport such as bus and Aksel M√∏llers Have Metro. In addition, close distance to Frederiksberg Center and the cozy Agricultural University Garden ‚Äì a small oasis in the busy city life. Here you will live in a quiet, green and at the same time central area with a short walking distance to virtually all daily necessities. Holger Danske‚Äôs road itself is a quiet road, planted with trees and good parking opportunities. The road is quietly located with one-way traffic.
You can cycle to the metro in five minutes and to the center of Copenhagen in ten minutes. BUS 2A runs towards R√•dhuspladsen, and there is a five-minute walk to the bus stop.

title: Central modern apartment with own rooftop terrace
description:
Available from June 1, 2025. 

A modern, stylish apartment located at the Harbour side, in central Copenhagen.

Perfect for the small family relocating or expats moving to Copenhagen for a limited time. There is a possibility for extension. 

/The apartment 
It is a two-bedroom apartment with three terraces, including a private rooftop terrace (approx. 60 m2) and the possibility to access two shared rooftop terraces. 

The apartment comes fully furnished with all needed kitchen wear and appliances, and further incl. dishwasher, washing machine, dryer etc. 

The building has elevator included, and it is possible to rent parking in the connected parking garage. 

/The neighbourhood
It is in a quiet neighbourhood within walking distance to "The Little Mermaid", Kastellet, and Kongens Nytorv. ‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãThere is a opportunity for grocery shopping within 20 meters.

title: New Studio Apartment with terrace - Fully furnished
description:
Welcome to Valby, where you can live in this modern, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen and terrace, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent.

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance.

The studio is equipped with:
‚Ä¢	Bed & mattress (120 x 200 cm)
‚Ä¢	Desk
‚Ä¢	Storage cabinet
‚Ä¢	Fully equipped kitchen (oven, hob, fridge, freezer, extractor hood)
‚Ä¢	Private bathroom with shower

‚Ä¢	Access to common areas including a lobby with seating and projector, reading room, meeting rooms
‚Ä¢	Roof terrace and courtyard garden
‚Ä¢	Atrium with cozy community atmosphere
‚Ä¢	Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.)

About the building complex:
‚Ä¢	Located in UMEUS Valby, part of the new Torveporten area
‚Ä¢	Proximity to K√∏benhavn Syd Metro (less than 300 meters away) - 15 min to Copenhagen Central Station by metro
‚Ä¢	F√∏tex supermarket 120m away from your doorstep
‚Ä¢	Close to Valby Park, Valby Strand, and other green areas
‚Ä¢	Easy access to the city center (15 min away by metro) and nearby Frederiksberg
‚Ä¢	Close to Intercity train - easy access to Denmark's‚Äô biggest cities: Odense, √Örhus, Aalborg, Frederikshavn. Esbjerg, Herning

Free access to community amenities:
‚Ä¢	Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships
‚Ä¢	Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment. 
The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, or just chill with a projector movie in our indoor cinema hall. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.  

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing!

title: Furnished Studio - Ideal for young professionals -  300m from Metro
description:
Welcome to Valby, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. 

This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 

The studio is equipped with: 
‚Ä£ Bed & mattress (120 x 200 cm) 
‚Ä£ Desk 
‚Ä£ Storage cabinet 
‚Ä£ Fully equipped kitchen (oven, hob, fridge, freezer, extractor hood) 
‚Ä£ Private bathroom with shower 

Free access to community amenities: 
‚Ä£ Access to common areas including a lobby with seating and projector, reading room, meeting rooms 
‚Ä£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
‚Ä£ Atrium with cozy community atmosphere 
‚Ä£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.) 

About the building complex: 
‚Ä£ Located in UMEUS Valby, part of the new Torveporten area 
‚Ä£ Proximity to K√∏benhavn Syd Metro (less than 300 meters away) - 15 min to Copenhagen Central Station by metro 
‚Ä£ F√∏tex supermarket 120m away from your doorstep 
‚Ä£ Close to Valby Park, Valby Strand, and other green areas 
‚Ä£ Easy access to the city center (15 min away by metro) and nearby Frederiksberg 
‚Ä£ Close to Intercity train - easy access to Denmark's‚Äô biggest cities: Odense, √Örhus, Aalborg, Frederikshavn. Esbjerg, Herning 

By living in this building complex, you will also enjoy a lively community: 
‚Ä£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
‚Ä£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, or just chill with a projector movie in our indoor cinema hall. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing!

title: A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn
description:
A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn - one of the most charming neighborhoods in Copenhagen, 450 metres from the Royal Opera, a three minutes wail from shopping and fitness and six minutes by bike to Kongens Nytorv.

From the entrance with space to hang outerwear you have access to all of the rooms. There is a combined dining and living room with access to the balcony facing the nice neighborhood. The nice and white kitchen is open to the dining area.

The three rooms can be used as bedrooms, study or guest room.

The bathroom has a shower and is equipped with a washer and a dryer.

In the basement you have a parking place and a storage room.

Available for 3 years from June 1st. for an expat or expat family
address: 24. marts, Bohlendachvej, 1437 K√∏benhavn, K√∏benhavn K  - 2. sal

title: 2-v√¶relses lejebolig i Herlev
description:
Velkommen til Bakkek√¶ret
√ÖBENT HUS:
Bakkek√¶ret:
Find din nye lejebolig blandt de 445 lejeboliger. Her er et husrum til dig, der har brug for at b√∏rnene f√•r eget v√¶relse. Til parret, der vil have ekstra god plads. Til jer, der vil downsize. Til dem der vil bo alene. Til dem der vil bo sammen.
Frem for alt er der plads til alle livsfaser og dr√∏mme i Bakkek√¶rets f√¶llesskab mellem dig, naboer og naturen.
Boligerne bliver f√¶rdige i 6 etaper og denne bolig ligger i ejendommens femte etape med indflytning 1. juni 2025.
G√•rdrum og f√¶llesskab:
Bakkek√¶rets hjerte er det gr√∏nne bakkedrag i g√•rdrummet, hvor gr√¶sset vokser til, tr√¶erne b√¶rer frugt og urtehaverne kan dyrkes. Her kan b√∏rnene udforske naturen og tumle p√• legepladsen eller du kan nyde en fredelig kop kaffe i en varm solplet.
Med tre orangerier, tagterrasser og et f√¶lleshus p√• 400 m2, er der skabt rum til b√•de alenetid, familietid og hyggetid.
Herlev:
Lige rundt om hj√∏rnet fra Bakkek√¶ret finder du Herlev Bymidte og Herlev Bygade. Her kan du klare hverdagens indk√∏b, men kan ogs√• finde restauranter, t√∏jbutikker, fris√∏r og meget mere. Du kan g√• en tur p√• det lille str√∏g ved Herlev Torv eller bes√∏ge butikkerne i Herlev Bymidte Center. Kun et par minutter fra bymidten ligger ogs√• BIG Shopping, hvor du kan finde bl.a. byggemarked, en biograf og et legeland for de mindste.
Forestil dig at bo et sted, hvor du kan have naturen og alt hvad du skal bruge i hverdagslivet t√¶t p√• ‚Äì og samtidig have K√∏benhavn inden for r√¶kkevidde. Hop p√• cyklen, ind i bilen eller S-toget p√• Herlev Station, og kom let p√• arbejde. G√• en tur i en af byens mange parker eller dyrk outdoor-livet i et af de gr√∏nne naturomr√•der.
Praktisk:
Derudover f√•r du:
- Elevator i bygningen
- Depotrum i k√¶lder eller plint
- Det er muligt at leje en p-plads i k√¶lderen (der er ogs√• el ladepladser)
Det med sm√•t:
- Det er ikke tilladt at st√• i RKI
- K√¶ledyr skal godkendes af udlejer

title: Lej en studiebolig i attraktive Valby
description:
Dr√∏mmer du om at bo i en studiebolig t√¶t p√• midtbyens mange sp√¶ndende tilbud og muligheder? Med en bolig p√• F√∏lager vil du bo dejligt centralt i en attraktiv og ny bydel i K√∏benhavn.


Da dette er en studiebolig, kr√¶ves det at man er aktivt studerende for at kunne blive tilbudt boligen.

Flotte boliger til dig som studerende i K√∏benhavn og omegn

Der er i alt 109 flotte studielejligheder i ejendommen. Lejeboligernes st√∏rrelser varierer fra 38 kvm til 54 kvm. Boligerne best√•r af √©t stort rum med fuldt k√∏kken - her er rig mulighed for, at du kan indrette rummene efter din egen personlige stil. Boligerne er fordelt p√• i alt fire etager med forskellige muligheder og udtryk p√• hver etage.


Ejendommens stueplan byder p√• boliger med tilh√∏rende terrasse ud til g√•rdmilj√∏et.


1. og 2. sal byder p√• boliger med fransk altan b√•de med udsigt over den nye bydel Gr√∏ntorvet eller over Svenskerbyen p√• den anden side. 3. sal byder ogs√• p√• boliger med fransk altan eller handicapvenlige boliger med egen udgang til svalegangsaltan med direkte adgang til ejendommens indbydende f√¶lles omdrejningspunkt - den store f√¶lles tagterrasse. Tr√¶nger du til frisk luft, kan du med stor forn√∏jelse s√¶tte dig op p√• denne store lyse f√¶lles tagterrasse.



P√• 1.-3. sal findes f√¶lles opholdsrum, hvor mulighederne er uendelige, hvad enten du vil lave mad sammen med dine naboer i f√¶llesk√∏kkenet, se TV i sofaarrangementet eller blot l√¶se lektier med eller uden den fri wifi, som der findes i rummene. Ejendommens g√•rdmilj√∏ byder p√• f√¶lles gr√∏nne omr√•der samt overd√¶kket cykelparkering i to etager.

Lej en 1-v√¶relses lejlighed i Valby n√¶r offentlig transport, indk√∏b og byliv

Boligerne har sin beliggenhed i en ny og attraktiv bydel i Valby. Her kan du nemt udleve dr√∏mmen om at bo i en af K√∏benhavns nye og inspirerende bydele.



Du vil som lejer bo i g√•afstand til blandt andet Metro, indk√∏bsmuligheder og fitnesscenter. Kun fire minutters gang fra lejligheden vil du n√• til Ny Ellebjerg Station. Stationen kan forbinde dig til resten af K√∏benhavn samt Sj√¶llands eventyrlige oplevelser. Indre By kan du allerede vandre i efter en metrotur p√• kun 13 minutter.

Velkommen til F√∏lager, 2450 K√∏benhavn SV

Ejendommen er opf√∏rt i 2018, s√• du kommer til at flytte ind i en l√¶kker og moderne bolig, der fremst√•r helt ny.



I k√¶lderen findes parkeringsomr√•der b√•de til biler og cykler. Der er derudover depotrum til alle boligerne samt et f√¶lles vaskeri. I stueplanen kan du ogs√• nyde gode at de 18 sm√• niche popup butikker, hvor kreativiteten for varerne n√¶sten ingen ende vil tage.

Aconto er fastsat ud fra forrige lejers forbrug. 
Der tages forbehold for fejl og evt. lejereguleringer.
Der vil blive indhentet oplysninger hos RKI, og er man registeret hos RKI, vil man ikke kunne leje boligen.

.

Eksklusivt badev√¶relse med smukke fliser, integreret h√•ndkl√¶det√∏rrer og vaskes√∏jle.

To gode sovev√¶relser mod Amaliegade, begge indrettet med indbyggede skabe, hvor der fra det ene sovev√¶relse er direkte adgang til endnu et badev√¶relse, ligeledes udf√∏rt i smukke fliser.

Fra stuen er der adgang via fire trin op til et sk√∏nt v√¶relse, som nemt kan anvendes til endnu et sovev√¶relse, b√∏rnev√¶relse, stue nummer to, kontor eller lignende. I forbindelse hermed adgang til mindre kammer, som kan indrettes til walk-in, opbevaring eller lille kontorkrog.

Ejendommen:

En smuk vindeltrappe forbinder etagerne og giver ejendommen karakter, mens elevatoren sikrer nem adgang. Omr√•det:

Frederiksstaden blev af Frederik den Femte anlagt i 1749. Det var tiden, hvor kongen, adlen og rige k√∏bm√¶nd kappedes om at opf√∏re bygningsv√¶rker med pomp og pragt. Centrum for Frederiksstaden er Amalienborg, og Amaliegade str√¶kker sig mod nord som fornem l√¶ngdeakse. Der var strenge krav til bygningernes arkitektoniske korrespondens, og kongens hofarkitekter Lauritz de Thurah og Nicolai Eigtved stod for planl√¶gning og udf√∏relse af den nye bydel. title: Modern Frederiksberg Studio with kitchen, loft & private terrace
description:
Welcome to Frederiksberg, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom, kitchen loft and terrace, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. Located centrally in the heart of the Frederiksberg hip and classy neighborhood, with plenty of opportunities for a modern, active life. The lively Rantzausgade and V√¶rnedamsvej are both just around the corner - and did we mention it's only 10 min walk from the Lakes? Forum & Nuuks Plads Metro st. are both very close by, and R√•dhuspladsen /City Hall is only a 5 minute away metro-ride. 

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 


The studio is equipped with: 

‚Ä£ Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  
‚Ä£ Kitchen with oven, fridge, freezer & stove, cabinets with a sink and extractor hood. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  
‚Ä£ Loft with bed 
‚Ä£ Terrace (6 sqm) 
‚Ä£ Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) + 2 stools.
‚Ä£ 3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 
‚Ä£ Bed, including a mattress and a mattress topper (140 cm x 200 cm) 
‚Ä£ Wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, ceiling lamp, blackout curtain and hooks for outerwear. 

Free access to community amenities: 
‚Ä£ Access to common areas including a lobby, reading room, meeting rooms 
‚Ä£ Free access to the fully equipped fitness (in-house) 
‚Ä£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
‚Ä£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.)  

About the building complex: 
‚Ä£ Located in UMEUS Frederiksberg, on B√ºlowsvej 
‚Ä£ Proximity to Forum Metro (700 meters away) - 5 min to Copenhagen City Centre 
‚Ä£ Frederiksberg Centre 1 km away from your doorstep 
‚Ä£ Restaurants, parks, caf√©s and plenty of shopping around 

Community Life: 
‚Ä£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
‚Ä£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, train in the fully-equipped gym or just chill on the rooftop with views over Copenhagen. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing!

description:
This beautifully designed apartment is available for rent unfurnished. The lease period is for 12-24 months with the potential for a lease extension.

Located in the preserved Mineral Water Factory building from the 1920s, the apartment is part of Carlsberg City's transformation into a vibrant residential area. The renovation process adhered to strict architectural standards, leading to the selection of Dorte Mandrup Architects to design the 20 new apartments.

At the top of the building, you'll be welcomed by a charming, landscaped atrium courtyard, where your private terrace is situated right in front of the apartment. Stepping inside, you'll find polished concrete floors and a joiner kitchen, featuring a kitchen island and solid Miele appliances. Next to the kitchen is a spacious and bathroom, complete with toilet, shower, and a combined washer and dryer unit.

The open-plan living area is perfect for both dining and relaxation, with access to the building‚Äôs shared polishing platform. On the upper mezzanine level, you will be greeted by solid oak plank flooring, high ceilings, and a bright, airy atmosphere ‚Äî ideal for a bedroom or home office.

The home features underfloor heating throughout the whole flat, and also the possibility to rent a parking space in the basement with EV charging. This flat combines the charm of a historic building with granite plinth and the like, while also offering the convenience of a modern one.

Beautiful apartment in N√∏rrebro for rent to a single person or couple

I am renting out my little oasis in the best part of N√∏rrebro from right away (March 8th) and until End May/Start June, depending on the agreement made. The apartment is 65 sq m and consists of 2 rooms, 2 balconies, a spacious kitchen/dining room, a large bathroom and is fully furnished. 5 minutes walk from metro station Skjolds Plads and 2 minutes from Bus 6A and Bus Nr. 18. 10 minutes from The Red & Black Square, "Assistentens Kirkeg√•rd", The Stefansgade Area and "F√¶lledparken". Location on the 4th floor means that the winter sun shines into both rooms on clear days and the apartment is lit up nonstop during summer months. 

The kitchen has a dining area for 5, a large oak bench and is otherwise fully equipped with an espresso machine, quality oven, gas hob, extractor hood, dishwasher and combination washer/dryer. There is an attached balcony that faces the courtyards and has a view of Bananna Park.

Large, spacious living room with 3-person sofa, armchair, 42" flat screen with Chromecast and lots of beautiful plants.

The bathroom consists of a built-in toilet, a separate shower with waterfall shower, heated floors and with 2 large barn windows to bring light into the room.

Du kan ogs√• tage enten cyklen eller metroen mod nord til musikoplevelser i DR Koncerthuset, eller bes√∏ge Bella Kvarter, som ligger 10 minutters gang mod syd, hvor Bella Arena og Bella Center byder p√• koncerter eller messer i l√∏bet af √•ret som fx den popul√¶re Bogmesse. Tager du et metrostop l√¶ngere mod syd finder du et af K√∏benhavns st√∏rste koncertsteder, Royal Arena, og tager du et stop mere, st√•r du p√• kanten af Kalvebod F√¶lled og et stenkast fra omr√•dets popul√¶re Naturcenter Amager. Herfra str√¶kker Naturpark Amagers √•bne vidder sig langt mod syd og indbyder til lange g√•ture i b√•de eng og skov eller langs vandet.

Forbehold

Vi g√∏r opm√¶rksom p√•, at interi√∏r- og eksteri√∏rbilleder af F√¶lledby og ejendommen C6 er 3D-visualiseringer. 3D-visu ‚Äì aliseringer tilstr√¶ber at vise bebyggelsen s√• n√∏jagtigt som muligt. Der tages forbehold for, at der p√• disse billeder i salgsmaterialet er gengivet genstande, overflader, materialer, udstyr og indretning, som ikke svarer n√∏jagtigt til det, der leveres. Dette g√∏r sig tillige g√¶ldende for nabobygninger, g√•rdmilj√∏, gangbroer, bel√¶gninger, udend√∏rs inventar mm., idet disse er angivet ud fra foreliggende oplysninger. Der kan ske √¶ndringer i det endelige udtryk, materialevalg og geometri. Bel√¶gninger, tr√¶er og beplantninger vises ikke n√∏dvendigvis som det vil se ud ved afleveringen af boligen, da beplantning har en etableringsperiode, og derfor f√∏rst vil vokse til med √•rene. V√¶sentlige afvigelser kan forekomme blandt andet p√• grund af myndighedskrav og byggesagsbehandling

description:
